thread.title: Trump Says His Policies Would Have Prevented 9/11
thread.title_full: Trump Says His Policies Would Have Prevented 9/11

author: Taegan Goddard
title: Trump Says His Policies Would Have Prevented 9/11
text:
Trump Says His Policies Would Have Prevented 9/11 October 18, 2015 By Taegan Goddard 0 Comments 
Donald Trump says that his immigration policies would have prevented the Sept. 11, 2001, terrorist attacks, The Hill reports. 
Said Trump: “I am extremely, extremely tough on illegal immigration. I am extremely tough on people coming into this country. I believe that if I were running things, I doubt that those people would have been in the country.” Related Posts Never miss a Political Wire post Your email address: * Please enter all required fields Correct invalid entries
